scripts.dist: npm run package:bin; npm run dist:linux; npm run dist:macos; npm run dist:win;
scripts.dist:linux: dir=bin; cd $dir; mv w3t-linux w3t; tar -cvzf w3t-linux.tar.gz w3t; rm w3t; sha256sum ./w3t-linux.tar.gz;
scripts.dist:macos: dir=bin; cd $dir; mv w3t-macos w3t; tar -cvzf w3t-macos.tar.gz w3t; rm w3t; sha256sum ./w3t-macos.tar.gz
scripts.dist:win: dir=bin; cd $dir; mv w3t-win.exe w3t; tar -cvzf w3t-win.tar.gz w3t; rm w3t; sha256sum ./w3t-win.tar.gz
